alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 07 at 4:10AM MST until January 09 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM MONDAY TO 5 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 15 inches. Locally higher amounts are possible. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Las Animas and Baca Counties. * WHEN...From 2 AM Monday to 5 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
